test_ruleset_00030a.name: Easy_Fabric
test_ruleset_00030a.description: Fabric for a VXLAN EVPN deployment with Nexus 9000 and 3000 switches.

annotations.Warning:
"Speficies the config used for RR and
spines with border or border gateway role.
This field should begin with
' template peer' or ' template peer-session'.
This must have 2 leading spaces.
Note ! All configs should
strictly match show run output,
with respect to case and newlines.
Any mismatches will yield
unexpected diffs during deploy."
annotations.Description:
Speficies the iBGP Peer-Template config used for RR and
spines with border role.

annotations.Warning:
"Specifies the config used for leaf, border or
border gateway.
If this field is empty, the peer template defined in
iBGP Peer-Template Config is used on all BGP
enabled devices (RRs, leafs,
border or border gateway roles).
This field should begin with
' template peer' or ' template peer-session'.
This must have 2 leading spaces.
Note ! All configs should
strictly match 'show run' output,
with respect to case and newlines.
Any mismatches will yield
unexpected diffs during deploy."

annotations.DisplayName: BGP Router ID Range for IPv6 Underlay

annotations.Description: Overlay Network Identifier Range (Min:1, Max:16777214)
Overlay VRF Identifier Range (Min:1, Max:16777214)
Per Switch Overlay Network VLAN Range (Min:2, Max:4094)
Per Switch Overlay VRF VLAN Range (Min:2, Max:4094)
Per Border Dot1q Range For VRF Lite Connectivity (Min:2, Max:4093)

VRF Lite Inter-Fabric Connection Deployment Options. If 'Back2Back&ToExternal' is selected, VRF Lite IFCs are auto created between border devices of two Easy Fabrics, and between border devices in Easy Fabric and edge routers in External Fabric. The IP address is taken from the 'VRF Lite Subnet IP Range' pool.
Whether to auto generate VRF LITE sub-interface and BGP peering configuration on managed neighbor devices. If set, auto created VRF Lite IFC links will have 'Auto Deploy for Peer' enabled.
Whether to auto generate Default VRF interface and BGP peering configuration on VRF LITE IFC auto deployment. If set, auto created VRF Lite IFC links will have 'Auto Deploy Default VRF' enabled.

annotations.DisplayName: Auto Deploy Default VRF for Peer
annotations.Description: Whether to auto generate Default VRF interface and BGP peering configuration on managed neighbor devices. If set, auto created VRF Lite IFC links will have 'Auto Deploy Default VRF for Peer' enabled.
Route Map used to redistribute BGP routes to IGP in default vrf in auto created VRF Lite IFC links
Address range to assign P2P Interfabric Connections
(Min:8, Max:31)

annotations.DisplayName: Auto Allocation of Unique IP on VRF Extension over VRF Lite IFC
annotations.Description: When enabled, IP prefix allocated to the VRF LITE IFC is not reused on VRF extension over VRF LITE IFC. Instead, unique IP Subnet is allocated for each VRF extension over VRF LITE IFC.
